email_text.subject: VG Wort: Pixel Tag Order Reminder
email_text.body:
Dear Editors,
This is a reminder that the minimal amount of the available pixel tags (defined in the VG Wort plug-in settings) is reached for {$contextName}.
There are {$availablePixelTagCount} available pixel tags at the moment. Please log into the press website and order new pixel tags.
Thank you, {$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This is an automatically generated email that is sent to editors as a reminder that new pixel tags should be ordered.

email_text.subject: VG Wort: Pixel Tag Registered
email_text.body:
Dear {$authorName},
The pixel tag with the private code "{$privateCode}" is assigned to your publication "{$articleTitle}" in {$contextName} and registered at VG Wort.
If the prerequisite for the payment of royalties for this electronic publication is reached, the authors will be notified by VG Wort.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This is an automatically generated email that is sent to an author after the registration of the pixel tag assigned to the publication.
